pan.name: Pan to Token
pan.hint: Should the camera pan to the token of the current combatant. This option is only for the GM.

delay.name: Hover Delay
delay.hint: Time in milliseconds before the tracker expands on mouse hover.

select.name: Select Token
select.hint: Select the token of the current combatant. This option is only for the GM.

sheet.name: Open Sheet
sheet.hint: Should the sheet of the current combatant be automatically opened. This option is only for the GM.

turn.name: Allow End Turn
turn.hint: Should the players be able to end their own turn.
